title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 8000.9 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 8000.9 - Public notice

State Regulations
A notice containing the title or name and business address of
the records access officer and appeals person and the location where records
can be seen or copies shall be posted in a conspicuous location wherever
records are kept. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
8000.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
